title: Syndra's ult performance in game
body:
That's not about syndra's ult is op... when I press R on syndra, the champion moves like in pictures, but fps is still 60. I don't know why, do not interrupt, just the champ.. and this is only when I press R on syndra, a lot of syndra's ult effects destroy my pc? Or..
Sorry for my English, I think you understand.
Thank you

replies.body:
Sometimes certain files can get corrupted and make these abilities freak out like Syndra is for you here. Let's do a quick config reset to make sure the files are all still alright by running a quick client repair through the settings, but also follow these steps to reset your config files.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
